title: Can you direct me on reteiving the article that was posted on January 18,2011 about \Cutting the cost from Time Warner cable from $90 dollars to almost free?"
text:
That story was posted on Yahoo! Finance. Here's a link:
http://finance.yahoo.com/news/First-Person-How-We-Cut-Cord-ac-4204109190.html?x=0&cmtnav=/mwphucmtgetnojspage/headcontent/main/4204109190//date/desc/11/s3504919
